      Convert a texture image into a byte buffer containing (u,v) couple of float values for each pixel. non defined coordinates are set to (0,0)

      code v texture coordinates as level of colors
      static BufferedImage toHSB(BinaryGradientImage image)
      code texture coordinates (u,v) with saturation and hue. u & v coordinates must be between 0 & 1
